DataElement.preferredName: Informed Consent Legally Acceptable Representative Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The description of the individual authorized to consent for participation in the clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Informed Consent Legally Acceptable Representative
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._An individual or juridical or other body authorized under applicable law to consent, on behalf of a prospective subject, to the subject's participation in the clinical trial. (ICH)

An individual or juridical or other body authorized under applicable law to consent, on behalf of a prospective subject, to the subject's participation in the clinical trial. (ICH)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A person of legal age to consent to a procedure as specifed by local regulation._The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To meet the requirements under law; not in violation of law or anything related to the law.: An activity that stands as an equivalent of something or results in an equivalent; typical of, or the same as, others in a larger group of people or things.

Concepts.definition: To meet the requirements under law; not in violation of law or anything related to the law.
An activity that stands as an equivalent of something or results in an equivalent; typical of, or the same as, others in a larger group of people or things.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2988262 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
